text: Having scaling and polishing service at Q&M Yew Tee Point. The dental very nice, polite and scan through my teeth thoroughly. He even help me polish my right sharp teeth which chip off a bit for free. Highly recommended and will come back next year again for schedule servicing. Thank you

Had a great experience as the Dr was helpful in teaching me how to floss as I do not know how. Cleaning, scaling and polishing was great and he also answered my questions and even gave me recommendations on how to keep my teeth healthy.

Dr Jennifer and team were professional and absolutely gentle and reassuring throughout the surgery.
